Name: Connect the Dots
About the game: Connect the Dots is a casual puzzle game with many difficulty levels. All points of the same color on the level must be connected with lines and so that the lines do not intersect with each other. The game has 5 difficulty levels, at each of which there are more points, as well as spaces for lines. Each difficulty level has 50 levels, with different point placement.
